system.descriptor: The User's ability to clear their mind and better channel the warp through the use of Mantras, psychic foci, meditation, etc.
system.uses:
Skill Test: On Success, user adds +1 to Final Psy Rating of any Fettered Power Test. Failiure instead suffers -1 Penalty to a Fettered Power Test, if this reduces Psy Rating to 0, the power automatically fails.
Note: Obviously, this skill requires the user to be able to use Psychic powers.
